}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device appears to be used in the ''Eion Wireless StarPlus CPE'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/XEC-SP1110-01 XEC-SP1110-01] (07/26/2012)
See also [[Compex WLM200NX]] rev 1.01 - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TK4WLM200NX TK4WLM200NX] (09/07/2016) :2x ''SiGe ([[Skyworks]])'' [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product/982/SE2593A20 SE2593A20] - Dual Band 802.11n WLAN RF Front-End Module
{{CompexEoL|This product is no longer available, it has been replaced by the [[Compex WLE200NX]].}}
==Notes== ===Specifications derived from the datasheet=== Specifications, per the datasheet, follow.. {| | style="vertical-align:top;" | *'''11a/g TX Output Power (all ±2 dB)''' **802.11a ***6-36Mbps, 18 dBm ***48Mbps, 17 dBm ***54Mbps, 16 dBm **802.11g ***6-24Mbps, 20 dBm ***36Mbps, 19.5 dBm ***48Mbps, 18.5 dBm ***54Mbps, 17 dBm
*'''11n TX Output Power (per chain, ±2 dB)''' **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 0/8, 18 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 1/9, 18 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 2/10, 18 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 3/11, 17.5 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 4/14, 17.5 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 5/13, 17 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 6/14, 16 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 7/15, 15 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 0/8, 18 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 1/9, 18 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 2/10, 17.5 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 3/11, 17 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 4/14, 16.5 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 5/13, 16 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 6/14, 15.5 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 7/15, 14.5 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 0/8, 18 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 1/9, 18 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 2/10, 17.5 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 3/11, 17.5 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 4/14, 16.5 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 5/13, 16 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 6/14, 15 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 7/15, 12 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 0/8, 16.5 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 1/9, 16.5 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 2/10, 16.5 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 3/11, 16.5 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 4/14, 16.5 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 5/13, 14.5 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 6/14, 14 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 7/15, 9 dBm
| style="vertical-align:top;" | *'''11a/g Receiver Sensitivity (all ±2 dB)''' **802.11a ***-94 dBm @ 6-9Mbps ***-93 dBm @ 12Mbps ***-90 dBm @ 18Mbps ***-86 dBm @ 24Mbps ***-83 dBm @ 36Mbps ***-79 dBm @ 48Mbps ***-77 dBm @ 54Mbps **802.11b ***-94 dBm @ 1Mbps ***-94 dBm @ 5.5 Mbps ***-94 dBm @ 11Mbps **802.11g ***-94 dBm @ 6-9Mbps ***-93 dBm @ 12Mbps ***-90 dBm @ 18Mbps ***-86 dBm @ 24Mbps ***-83 dBm @ 36Mbps ***-80 dBm @ 48Mbps ***-78 dBm @ 54Mbps
*'''11n Receiver Sensitivity (all ±2 dB)''' **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 0, -93 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 1, -92 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 2, -90 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 3, -86 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 4, -83 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 5, -78 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 6, -77 dBm **2.4GHz, HT20, MCS 7, -74 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 0, -90 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 1, -89 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 2, -87 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 3, -84 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 4, -80 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 5, -76 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 6, -74 dBm **2.4GHz, HT40, MCS 7, -72 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 0, -93 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 1, -91 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 2, -87 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 3, -85 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 4, -82 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 5, -78 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 6, -77 dBm **5GHz, HT20, MCS 7, -74 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 0, -90 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 1, -88 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 2, -85 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 3, -82 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 4, -80 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 5, -76 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 6, -74 dBm **5GHz, HT40, MCS 7, -72 dBm |}
